name: Park Tool TL-5 Heavy Duty Steel Tire Lever- Pair
categories: TL-5 Heavy Duty Steel Tire Lever- Pair
description: Designed to pry off the toughest tires from the toughest rims, these heavy-duty steel tire levers won't snap when you crank on them. You get 20.3cm of leverage and a tip designed to engage the tire bead.Forged steel offers more stiffness than plastic levers.Hook at the tip improves grip on tire bead.Length is 8 inches (20.3cm).
